column5: Does anyone have accurate list of what is on the banned list of items that can be brought across ?? I know the old usual things ( live bait , smelt , etc . ) but need to know the new , beef items , sausage , etc. Thanks.
I think there is a link or phone number included in this resort's information about border crossing.http://www.quebecfishingcamps.com/In...e%20border.htm
I found a consular information sheet that may be of interest. Doesn't appear to address questions of food restrictions. Try this URLhttp://travel.state.gov/canada.html
Ah, this ought to be good !!!
